body: # jQuery.counter (javascript + css3) ![jQuery Counter](http://i.imgur.com/ub7D9.png) A jQuery counter based on http://code.google.com/p/jquery-countdown with more options. ## Options Options can be set by attribute `data-="value"` or in the options hash on counter initialization: `$(element).counter({name: value, ...})` **`direction: up|down`** Counter direction **`format: string`** Defines the format and the limit for each part - _e.g: 23:59:59_ **`interval: number`** Defines the time between each counter increment - _by default 1000 milliseconds_ **`stop: string`** Defines the counter limit - _eg: 10:00 (ten minutes)_ ## Events **`counterStop`** Raised when the counter reach limit ## Example ### 10 seconds countdown: 0:10 ### 120 seconds count: 0 ## License MIT License
